title: Babosas
body: Site in the parish of Monte, where there is a small square or viewpoint, which has been named Conceição since 1906, when a chapel dedicated to Nossa Senhora da Conceição was built there. It is a place that is quite frequented and from there one can enjoy a beautiful landscape of the picturesque site of Curral dos Romeiros.

Monte: Parish where the site of Babosas is located

1906: Construction of the chapel dedicated to Nossa Senhora da Conceição at the site of Babosas
